Othius Stephens, 1829a: 23
(species included:
fulgidus
,
pilicornis
,
ustulatus
).
TYPE SPECIES:
Staphylinus punctulatus Goeze
, fixed by action of the Commission in Opinion 1250 (ICZN, 1983).
— Mulsant and Rey, 1877a: 219 (characters; key to French species).
— Heyden, 1880: 76 (list of species of Siberian region).
— Heyden, Reitter, and Weise, 1891: 105 (list of species of Europe and Caucasus).
— Heyden, 1893: 43 (list of species of Siberian region).
— Ganglbauer, 1895: 468 (larval and adult characters; key to middle European species).
— Heyden, Reitter, and Weise, 1906: 162 (list of species of Europe and Caucasus).
— Blackwelder, 1944: 145 (checklist of species from Mexico , Central and South America, and

— Tottenham, 1949: 371 (synonym of
Gyrohypnus
; type species:
punctulatus Goeze
).
— V. Hansen, 1952: 23 (characters; key to Danish species).

— Coiffait, 1956a: 37, 38 (characters; key to species; cited as synonym of
Gyrohypnus
but believes rules of priority should be suspended for this case).

— Smetana, 1958: 122 (characters; habitus of one species; type species:
laeviusculus
; key to Czechoslovakian species).
— Lohse, 1964: 167 (characters; key to central European species).
— Coiffait and Saiz, 1968: 345 (list of Chilean species).

— Coiffait, 1972: 327 (characters; larval characters; type species:
punctulatus
; key to species of western Palaearctic region; references).
— Palm, 1979: 269 (key to species of Madeira ; notes).

— Smetana, 1979: 50 (requested that International Commission on Zoological Nomenclature set aside all type species designations and designate
Staphylinus punctulatus Goeze
as type species and place
Othius
on the Official list of Generic Names in Zoology).
— Uhlig and Vogler, 1981: 109 (list of some species collected in Germany ; habitat and collecting notes).

— ICZN, 1983: 85 (
Othius
placed on Official List of Generic Names in Zoology and
Staphylinus punctulatus
is fixed as the type species).
— Shibata, 1986a: 123 (supplemental list of species from Taiwan) .
— Lohse and Lucht, 1989: 159 (supplement to key to species of Lohse, 1964).
— Angelini, 1991: 192 (list of species from high elevations of Calabria , Italy ).
— Silfverberg, 1992: 18 (list of species of Fennoscandia, Denmark , and the Baltic States).
— Janák, 1993a: 47 (list of species of Czech Republic and Slovakia ).
— Assing and Wunderle, 1995a (revision of and key to species of Madeira ; notes).
— Assing, 1997 (revision of and key to species of western Palaearctic; characters for species groups).
— Assing, 1998 (revision of and key to species of Himalayan region).
— Assing, 1998a (new records for, colonization by, and phylogeny of species of Madeira Canary Islands ).
— Assing, 1999 (revision of and key to eastern Palaearctic species east of Himalaya).
— Assing and Schülke, 1999: 8 (key to species of central Europe).
